articles.author: Joshua Berlinger, Christian Edwards
articles.title: What is Georgia’s ‘foreign agents’ bill, and why is Europe so alarmed? - CNN
articles.description: Georgia’s parliament is set to pass a highly controversial so-called “foreign agents” bill that has triggered widespread protests across the former Soviet Republic nestled in the Caucasus Mountains.
articles.content:
Georgias parliament is set to pass a highly controversial so-called foreign agents bill that has triggered widespread protests across the former Soviet republic nestled in the Caucasus Mountains.
